attributes.action: Ban the sale of class 3 display fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details:
I'd like the government to ban the sale of class 3 fireworks due to a few reason. 
People seem to be using these fireworks all year around.
Most of these fireworks have a retreat distance of between 20 and 50 meters. I'm pretty sure that most suburban gardens aren't that big, so this would increase risk of injury. 
Lastly the volume of the explosion causes immense stress and worry to countless pets and wild animals. I'd also assume that it causes upset to some older residents
attributes.background: Ban the sale of class 3 fireworks to the general public

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open on this topic, which you may like to sign:

Restrict Cat 3 fireworks to professionals & require licences for Cat 2 fireworks
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601198

Make fireworks illegal to buy, with the exception of public displays.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591501

Ban the manufacture, import, sale and use of fireworks in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599738
